column4: if you want to add files (don't know if you can do this) you would have to mount the iso as loopback device and add the files *before* burning. any comments on whether that would work?
ive done it, but it can be slower thana program just burning the contents of the iso too disk
mounting the iso and then burning a data disc of the contents + whatever?
is slower than just burning the contents to a cd..
